original_text: Yes, when God judges everyone, he will punish the people of Tyre and Sidon. But he will punish even more you people from Chorazin and Bethsaida.
korean_text: 심판 때에 두로와 시돈이 너희보다 견디기 쉬우리라

sentences.korean_translation: 네, 하나님이 모든 사람을 심판하실 때

sentences.original_text: he will punish the people of Tyre and Sidon
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 두로와 시돈 사람들을 벌하실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: But he will punish even more
you people from Chorazin and Bethsaida
